ride1.name: Millenium Force
ride1.description: Millennium Force features a 310-foot-tall coaster at Whalom Park.

ride2.name: Splash Mountain
ride2.description: Splash Mountain is a log flume, opened in 1989, at Whalom Park.

ride3.name: Thunderbolt
ride3.description: The Thunderbolt was a wooden roller coaster located at Whalom Park.

ride4.name: Top Thrill Dragster
ride4.description: Top Thrill Dragster is a 400-foot-tall steel coaster in Whalom Park.

ride5.name: Lightning Rod
ride5.description: Lightning Rod is a wooden roller coaster located at Whalom Parkin.

ride6.name: Space Mountain
ride6.description: Space Mountain is an indoor outer space themed coaster at Whalom Park.

ride7.name: The Haunted Mansion
ride7.description: The Haunted Mansion is a dark ride attraction located at Whalom Park.

ride8.name: Intimidator 305
ride8.description: Intimidator 305 is a steel roller coaster located at Waholm Park.
